name: Monster Mukti
description:
Monster Mukti is a modern take on the action-packed mythologies of India, featuring deities and demons as superheroes and villains. The aim is to bring these fantastic stories back into the modern culture by letting audiences experience the thrills and adventures inherent in them.

Run through richly coloured and textured environments meant to evoke the natural beauty of India. Break pots for hidden loot. Ride a super-powered chariot. And collect a superpower coin to ask for help from another mythological being - Garuda!
